name: sfpwowerscript-promoteunlockedpackage-task
description: This taks is used to promote an unlocked package before installing into production, This task is part of DX@Scale/SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: Read more info about the task at https://sfpowerscripts.com/tasks/packaging-tasks/promote%20an%20unlocked%20package/, Ensure the required prerequisite tasks are run before this taks is executed
author: azlam.abdulsalam

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package to be promoted
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the package to be promoted,for informational purpose

inputs.name: packagepromotedfrom
inputs.label: Package to be promoted From

options.BuildArtifact: Utilize the version id from the attached build artifact
options.Custom: Pass the package version id as an argument

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option from where the package version is to be picked up for promotion

inputs.name: package_version_id
inputs.label: Package Version ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the pipeline's build number to the the project's incremented version number

inputs.name: artifact
inputs.label: Name of the artifact that is attached to this release pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the artifact which is the input to this pipeline. Please note only sfpowerkit based build artifact will work with this command

inputs.name: devhub_alias
inputs.label: Alias/Username of the devhub
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the alias of the devhub previously authenticated, default value is HubOrg if using the Authenticate Devhub task

inputs.name: isTelemetryEnabled
inputs.label: Send Anonymous Usage Telemetry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this will help us to collect information on the tasks and improve services. All information collected is anonymised, please check code repository to understand what data is collected
